Package capstone.ui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ButtonSlot
    A Widget containing a Panel to which Buttons or optionally other Components or Widgets can be added.
    ComboBox<T>
    A Widget containing a Button that opens a ListWidget.
    DifficultyWidget
    A Widget to select the difficulty of a level.
    HighscoreWidget
    A Widget to display the entries of the highscore for a level, i.e.
    HighscoreWindow
    A Window for selecting a level and showing a HighscoreWidget for that level (the HighscoreWidget shows the entries of the Highscore object associated with the file).
    InputKey
    A superior lanterna-Key class that adds some factory and utility functions as well as a proper equals() implementation.
    InputWidget
    A utility class that is a NamedWidget with a ValidatedTextBox, i.e.
    KeyMapCreationWidget
    Manages creation of a new KeyMap.
    LegendWidget
    A Widget to display the Legend, sourced from a Theme object.
    LevelWindow
    Window to select a level, either a new one or from an old session.
    ListWidget<T>
    A Widget to display a list of Items of generic type.
    MenuWindow
    The window to display the in-game menu.
    NamedWidget<W extends Widget>
    A Widget that is a slot with a Label and another Widget.
    ProfileCreationWindow
    The Window for creating a profile.
    ProfileWindow
    Window for selecting profiles.
    RepresentationWidget
    A Widget to create a Representation.
    StatusBar
    Manages showing the StatusBar for a Level.
    ThemeCreationWidget
    A Widget to manage creation of a new Theme.
    ThemeWindow
    The Window managing Themes.
    ValidatedTextBox
    A thin TextBox-wrapper that can check if its input matches a certain regular-expression pattern.
    WelcomeWindow
    The Window at startup of the whole game.
    Widget
    I have spent a large chunk of my life programming GUI applications with PyQt in Python and Qt in C++ and in Qt, everything is a widget.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ButtonSlot.Kind
    Default Buttons.
